s.cutPocket: Not shown: the **Pocket**, a rectangle of {{{ width }}} wide and {{{ length }}} long <small>(this includes seam allowance)</small>
s.cutStrap: Not shown: the **Straps**, two rectangles of {{{ width }}} wide and {{{ length }}} long <small>(this includes seam allowance)</small>

backOpening.d: Controls the opening at the back of the apron

chestDepth.d: Controls the length of the straps

lengthBonus.d: Controls the length of the apron

bibLength.d: Controls the length of the bib

bibWidth.d: Controls the width of the bib

strapWidth.d: Controls the width of the strap
